Hellplague/ Malice:
 
Hellplague pulled herself off her bed and stepped into the hall.  She walked to Malice's room where Blacknightmare was waiting.  The Sweep commander hit the door tone, and the door slid open.  Malice was sitting on his bed, not looking like himself.  He looked tired, exhausted.  Concerned with what he dreamed earlier.
"Malice, what's wrong?" she said walking in.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare:

"We should my dear"replied the femme"I'll see ya in his quarters 
door"

The femme stoodf up and waleked towards Malice's quarters, soon she 
will arrive there 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
> 
> Malice closed his comm and fell on the bed.  He fell asleep soon 
> after.
> 
> In his dreams, he met three bots.  The first was a big and tall 
one, 
> he had red eyes and a sinister laugh.  He laughed at Malice, until 
> Malice curled up to cover his audios.
> 
> The second was a femme, tall and slender.  She too laughed at him, 
> and pointed and laughed.
> 
> The third and final was also a femme.  But she was differant.  She 
> was a little shorter than the previous, and kind.  She kneeled 
down 
> and tried to reach out to him.  He at first, moved away, but then, 
> reached for her.
> 
> Malice awoke several hours later, sitting up.  He was breathing 
hard, 
> and it triggered a signal in Hellplague.
> 
> Hellplague opened a channel to Malice, who ignored it for a moment.
> "Yes, Master?"
> "Are you alright?  My sensors in your body detected an emotional 
> overload.  Ae you okay?"
> "Yes, I am fine."
> Hellplague closed the channel, and laid back down.  She wondered 
if 
> she should tell Blacknightmare.
> "Blacknightmare," she said softly into her comm,"Malice isn't 
feeling 
> good.  He had a dream or something, it really bothered him.  I 
worry, 
> if it will afect his performance somehow.  Should we go and check 
on 
> him?" 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare::
> > 
> > "Anything else"sais teh femme"Rest well"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice:
> > >  
> > > Malice rolled off his bed and walked to the door.  He shut the 
> > door and locked it, programming the door tone to respond only to 
> > Hellplague and Blacknightmare.
> > > "I've locked my door, anything else, Master?"
